character.name: Bloch
description: Your ship's mentalist. Specializes in <c=boldPink>reducing incoming damage</c>, <c=boldPink>card draw manipulation</c> and <c=boldPink>discard effects</c>.

DiscardOther.name: Discard Other
DiscardOther.description: Discard {{Count}} random cards, other than this one.

OnDiscard.name: On Discard
OnDiscard.description: This action only triggers whenever this card is discarded during your turn without playing it.

OnTurnEnd.name: On Turn End
OnTurnEnd.description: This action only triggers when you end your turn with this card in hand.

Spontaneous.name: Spontaneous
Spontaneous.description: This action only triggers whenever a turn starts with this card in hand, or if it's drawn for the first time this turn.

Scry.name: Scry
Scry.description: Look at the top <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> cards of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. If there aren't enough cards, reshuffle the <c=keyword>discard pile</c> first. Choose cards to discard.

Veiling.name: Veiling Aura
Veiling.description: Reduce incoming hits by 1 and <c=downside>decrease this by 1</c>.

Feedback.name: Feedback Aura
Feedback.description: When hit, deal 1 hull damage to the enemy and <c=downside>decrease this by 1</c>.

Intensify.name: Intensify
Intensify.description: All of your auras trigger again for each stack of this. <c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>

Retain.name: Mind Map
Retain.description: At the end of your turn, choose up to {0} cards to <c=cardtrait>retain</c>.

SplitPersonality.name: Personality Split
SplitPersonality.description: The next {0} <c=action>attacks</c> or <c=action>launches</c> are copied and mirrored against the ship's center.

Spontaneous.name: Triggered This Turn
Spontaneous.description: This card's <c=action>Spontaneous</c> actions already triggered this turn.

AuraMastery.name: AURA MASTERY
AuraMastery.description: Every 2 <c=status>VEILING AURA</c> you gain, gain 1 <c=status>FEEDBACK AURA</c> or <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c> at random.

Composure.name: COMPOSURE
Composure.description: <c=status>INTENSIFY</c> now only reduces by 1 at the start of each turn.

FutureVision.name: FUTURE VISION
FutureVision.description: Whenever you keep any cards during <c=action>Scry</c>, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> one of the cards at random.

LastingInsight.name: LASTING INSIGHT
LastingInsight.description: Refund 1 <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c> for each card kept during its <c=action>Scry</c>.

MuscleMemory.name: MUSCLE MEMORY
MuscleMemory.description: <c=action>On Discard</c> effects now also trigger when a card is played.

UnlockedPotential.name: UNLOCKED POTENTIAL
UnlockedPotential.description: <c=action>Spontaneous</c> effects now also trigger when a card is played.

VainMemories.name: VAIN MEMORIES
VainMemories.description: Gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c> whenever you discard a card during your turn without playing it.

ChangePerspective.name: Perspective Change
ChangePerspective.description: Convert any <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> into {{ConvertToIntensifyAmount}} <c=status>intensify</c> or {{ConvertToAuraAmount}} of a different <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.

description.None: Attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gains <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat.
description.A: Attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gains <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat.
description.B: Attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gains <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat.

description.None: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many.
description.A: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many, +2.
description.B: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many. Twice.

stateless.None: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum.
stateless.A: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum.
stateless.B: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum.

stateful.None: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum: <c=hurt>{{Damage}}</c>.
stateful.A: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum: <c=hurt>{{Damage}}</c>.
stateful.B: Discard hand. Attack for the energy cost sum: <c=hurt>{{Damage}}</c>.

description.B: Gain 1 of each <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gain 1 of each <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.
